name: EduPredict Environment
postCreateCommand: conda create -y -n edupredenv python=3.10 && conda init bash && echo 'conda activate edupredenv' >> ~/.bashrc
postStartCommand: bash -c 'source ~/.bashrc && conda activate edupredenv && if [ ! -f ~/.edupredenv_setup_complete ]; then pip install -r requirements.txt && touch ~/.edupredenv_setup_complete; fi'
